title: Implement Spicy Mode - Seedream v4 img-to-img editing
description:
Implement Seedream v4.5 img-to-img editing feature (Spicy Mode).

PLAN: plans/260204-2054-spicy-mode-seedream-integration/

PHASES:
1. Seedream service (upload, task, poll, rate limiter)
2. UI toggle with chili icon, conditional rendering
2.5. Credit monitoring (balance badge, auto-refresh)
3. Integration with generation flow
4. Unit tests

KEY CONSTRAINTS:
- Rate limit: 20 req/10s (token bucket)
- Quality: basic (2K) / high (4K) only
- No temperature param in Seedream
- Async polling (not sync like Gemini)

BRANCH: spicy_mode
close_reason: Implemented Spicy Mode with Seedream 4.5 integration, unified API key modal, and centralized logging system
